!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi Feb 11, 2004 09:52:02.401
!MESSAGE Bundle 
reference:file:j:/teamswt/Chrix/I20040210/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.sdk.examp
les.source.win32.win32.x86_3.0.0 [85] was not resolved

Pascal:
are you able to install the plugin examples onto I20040210 (M7 candidate)?
I'm getting the exception above and they don't show up. Does this sound 
familiar?

The problem you are encountering comes from the fact that the plugin.xml for 
the browser example states that it is pure 3.0 (3.0 marker in the header and 
absence of org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility), but the code is not 3.0 
compatible (the plugin class does not contain an empty constructor).

Three ways to fix the problem:
- remove the 3.0 tag from the header
- add org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility in the requires list
- add an empty constructor in your plugin class

There is an explanation of the new model in bug #50448 comment #19.

thanks Pascal.

fixed v>20040211

I removed the 3.0 tag in the browser plugin.xml to be consistent with the 
other SWT plugins.
